entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
